course_title: Child Protection and International Human Rights
course_description: The course will examine the legal framework on child protection; explore the different factors challenging child's rights protection; analyze child vulnerability cases; and, evaluate the needs of children exposed to exploitation. IT will also consider the policies and strategies that aim to create a protective environment for children at the international, federal, and state levels.
sections: Class Nbr: 1094, Section #: 001, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: Th 1-4p, Instructor: R. Liwanga, Status: Open
